about.heading: About Me
about.description: I'm an enthusiastic developer currently pursuing my degree in Computer Science, driven by a deep passion for building modern, meaningful web experiences. While I'm still early in my journey and have no formal industry experience yet, I'm actively strengthening my skills in React, Next.js, and Node.js through personal projects and continuous learning.
about.paragraph2: I'm especially fascinated by cloud computing and am working toward building a solid foundation to kickstart my career in this fast-evolving domain. My curiosity naturally extends into emerging technologiesâ€”I've already explored practical applications of Quantum Computing through an academic project, and I'm equally captivated by the possibilities of blockchain and its potential impact on the future of digital systems.
about.paragraph3: Every project I take on is an opportunity to grow, experiment, and push the limits of what I can create. I'm committed to writing clean, maintainable code and staying aligned with modern development practices. Collaboration, consistency, and a hunger to learn shape my journey as I work toward becoming a capable, industry-ready developer.
